mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_EXAM_RESULT_INFO (EXAM_NO, EXAM_SOURCE, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, EXAM_PARA, IS_ABNORMAL, RESULT_DATE_TIME, EXAM_DOCTOR_CODE, EXAM_DOCTOR_NAME, REVIEW_DOCTOR_CODE, REVIEW_DOCTOR_NAME, CLIN_DIAG, INS_DEPT_CODE, INS_DEPT_NAME, EXAM_DATE, DESCRIPTION, IMPRESSION, RECOMMENDATION, EXAM_TIPS) values (#{examNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examPara,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isAbnormal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{examDoctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDoctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clinDiag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insDeptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{impression,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{recommendation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{examTips,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select EXAM_NO, EXAM_SOURCE, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, EXAM_PARA, IS_ABNORMAL, RESULT_DATE_TIME, EXAM_DOCTOR_CODE, EXAM_DOCTOR_NAME, REVIEW_DOCTOR_CODE, REVIEW_DOCTOR_NAME, CLIN_DIAG, INS_DEPT_CODE, INS_DEPT_NAME, EXAM_DATE, DESCRIPTION, IMPRESSION, RECOMMENDATION, EXAM_TIPS from V_HIS_EXAM_RESULT_INFO
